title: Im too toxic stop me from typing in chat
body: Riot i get really salty at stupid stuff and there fore i flame so my main account got perma banned because off that so in asking if you could disable my chat until i reach atleast level 35 because i dont feel nice flaming people in my level now because they are new too the game im already on a 25 game chat restrict i dont wanna get banned again thank you riot

replies.body: You need to take some responsibility for your chat. Riot is not obligated to make systems aimed at keeping players that persist in making negative experiences for other players.

Riot won't provide a service for you to mute yourself as they believe you need to show the self restraint yourself to take that step, you are the problem and the soultion, you just need to find the will power inside you.
Additionaly, you can hide the chat in it's entirety with settings.

You can mute everyone at the start of the game or you can resize/move the chat such that you can't see it well anymore and it should stay that way, if you think you will forget to mute people.


If you have a high end keyboard you can use the program that comes with the keyboard to rebind the enter key to act as some other key.

You can invest in the following object
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00M9ETHYU/
and use this to physically remove the enter key.

Lastly and this is a **dangerous** choice as it may or may not violate riots 3rd party program section. you can create a program using python or autoit that will disable/rebind the key while the program is running. there may be other programming languages you can do this in, but those are the only two I know how to program in and have used to tamper with keybindings for non-gaming purposes in the past.


But the above mentioned things should only be used as a temporary solution because the best choice is to try to find the means to learn self-control. Some examples being, via breathing exercises, Meditation, finding a professional to help you. I am going to be honest. If you really don't have the self-control to be able to control what buttons you press on a keyboard. You might need to talk to a professional about the situation. Because if you can't control yourself with something as simple as pressing keys on a keyboard. I start to wonder what else you can't control to well.
I mean.... he can just unbind the key settings......
Inless i'm blind. I don't see anywhere in the client settings under hot keys to unbind the enter key from chat.
